entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
